operator.name: Random Search
operator.synopsis: Random search for attribute selection
operator.help: Randomly selects attributes for attribute selection process

operator.name: Simulated Annealing
operator.synopsis: Simulated annealing for attribute selection
operator.help: Simulated annealing is a generic probabilistic metaheuristic for the global optimization problem of locating a good approximation to the global optimum

operator.name: VNS (Perturber)
operator.synopsis: Variable Neighbourhood Search for attribute selection
operator.help: Variable Neighborhood Search (VNS) proposed by (Mladenovic, Hansen, 1997) is a metaheuristic method for solving a set of combinatorial optimization and global optimization problems

operator.name: Hill Climbing
operator.synopsis: Hill climbing for attribute selection
operator.help: Hill climbing is an iterative algorithm that starts with an arbitrary solution to a problem, then attempts to find a better solution by incrementally changing a single element of the solution

operator.name: VNS (Perturber)
operator.synopsis: Variable Neighbourhood Search for attribute selection
operator.help: Variable Neighborhood Search (VNS) proposed by (Mladenovic, Hansen, 1997) is a metaheuristic method for solving a set of combinatorial optimization and global optimization problems

operator.name: VNS (Simulated Annealing)
operator.synopsis: Variable Neighbourhood Search for attribute selection
operator.help: Variable Neighborhood Search (VNS) proposed by (Mladenovic, Hansen, 1997) is a metaheuristic method for solving a set of combinatorial optimization and global optimization problems

operator.name: VNS (Hill Climbing)
operator.synopsis: Variable Neighbourhood Search for attribute selection
operator.help: Variable Neighborhood Search (VNS) proposed by (Mladenovic, Hansen, 1997) is a metaheuristic method for solving a set of combinatorial optimization and global optimization problems

operator.name: Harmony Search
operator.synopsis: Harmony search for attribute selection
operator.help: Harmony search is a phenomenon-mimicking algorithm inspired by the improvisation process of musicians proposed by Zong Woo Geem in 2001

operator.name: Iterated Local Search
operator.synopsis: Iterated Local Search for attribute selection
operator.help: Iterated Local Search is a modification of local search or hill climbing methods for solving mostly discrete optimization problems

operator.name: Random Search
operator.synopsis: Random search for attribute selection
operator.help: Randomly selects attributes for attribute weighting process

operator.name: Simulated Annealing

operator.name: Random Parameter Search
operator.synopsis: Random search for parameter optimization
operator.help: Randomly selects parameters of algorithm
